tool_description: This is just an API for testing
name: Get Your Name
title: Get Your Name

api_list.name: getname
api_list.description: An API endpoint to get your name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-your-name.p.rapidapi.com/getname"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-your-name.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-your-name.p.rapidapi.com/getname"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-your-name.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
